means: 啐！哼！（表示不耐烦、轻蔑时的叫声）

sentence.Network_en: Every day we say to ourselves,'Pshaw! I will learn tomorrow.'
sentence.Network_cn: 每天我们都对自己说:‘哼! 我明天再学. ’

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 _ 上海疯狂英语... ... pseudoscope 幻视镜 pshaw 不耐烦 psilocybin 迷幻药.
英汉感叹词的差别-青青岛社区 ... pooh 呸! pshaw 啐! eh 嗯!呃.
英语口语会话中可能会用到哪些语气词？_百度知道 ... pooh-pooh 呸呸 pshaw 哼 so 就这样.
哼哼的英语翻译，哼哼用英文怎么说 -... ... snort1.  哼的一声 pshaw1. (对…)啐一声 humming1.  嗡嗡作响;哼唱的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: natural exclamation: first recorded in English in the late 17th cent

auth_sentence.content: Danger? pshaw! fiddlesticks! everybody scouted the idea.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Danger? pshaw! fiddlesticks! everybody scouted the idea.

auth_sentence.content: His father got it exactly right when he remarked about these stories, But pshaw!
